# Libraries
```{r echo=TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(survival)
library(lubridate)
library(Table1)
library(survival)
library(survMisc)

source("../../format_data.R")
```


# Data
```{r echo=TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
data <- read_excel("../../../data/time_to_treatment_data.xlsx") %>% 
  format_data(article_number = 3)

curative_received <- original %>% filter((crt == "Yes" | rt == "Yes") & curative_palliative_status == "Curative")
```


# Table 1
```{r echo=TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
# Skipping HIV+ only variables: cd4_final, hiv_cd4_cat, hiv_cd4_cat2, on_arv, vl_detect... See below for calculations for these variables

quick.table(curative_received[, c("enroll_age", "age_cat", "marital", "cancer_screening", 
                         "distance_factored2", "init_combined_cancer_stage", 
                         "final_combined_cancer_stage", "cr_result", "hb_result", "neut_result", 
                         "wbc_result", "alb_result", "init_performance_status", "hiv_status",
                         "surgery_only", "rt", "chemo_only", "crt", "primary_surgery_chemo", 
                         "primary_surgery_rt", "primary_surgery_crt", "path_treatment_30", 
                         "path_treatment_60", "path_treatment_84", "path_treatment_90", 
                         "path_treatment_120", "path_treatment_150", "path_treatment_180", 
                         "pathology_year", "eqd2", "brachy_curr_dose", "ebrt_curr_dose", 
                         "ebrt_boost_curr_dose", "total_chemo_received", "treat_response")])
```


```{r echo=TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
# cd4_final
# median
sapply(select(filter(curative_received, hiv_status == "HIV-infected"), cd4_final), median, na.rm = T)
# quantiles
quantile(select(filter(curative_received,  hiv_status == "HIV-infected"), cd4_final), probs = c(0.25, 0.75), na.rm = T)

# hiv_cd4_cat
# counts
curative_received %>% 
  filter(hiv_status == "HIV-infected") %>% 
  group_by(hiv_cd4_cat) %>% 
  summarise(n())

# hiv_cd4_cat2
# counts
curative_received %>% 
  filter(hiv_status == "HIV-infected") %>% 
  group_by(hiv_cd4_cat2) %>% 
  summarise(n())

# vl_final
# mean
sapply(select(filter(curative_received, hiv_status == "HIV-infected"), vl_final), median, na.rm = T)
# quantiles
quantile(select(filter(curative_received, hiv_status == "HIV-infected"), vl_final), probs = c(0.25, 0.75), na.rm = T)

# on_arv
curative_received %>% 
  filter(hiv_status == "HIV-infected") %>% 
  group_by(on_arv) %>% 
  summarise(n())

# vl_detect
curative_received %>% 
  filter(hiv_status == "HIV-infected") %>% 
  group_by(vl_detect) %>% 
  summarise(n())
```
